short_description: Full-stack employment platform with intelligent job matching.
long_description: My graduation project, FursaPal, is a full-stack AI-powered employment platform. It features a responsive UI built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and a robust back-end powered by PHP (MVC). Key features include intelligent job matching, content verification via the OpenAI API, and secure user authentication.

short_description: Front-end for a modern, responsive e-commerce platform.
long_description: A full-featured e-commerce store front-end built using React. It includes a dynamic hero section, product categories (like Beauty, Fragrances, Furniture), a navigation bar, and a clean, responsive layout for a modern user experience. Deployed on Netlify.

short_description: Core back-end and RESTful APIs using Java & Spring Boot.
long_description: A hands-on development role on a real-world Delivery System. Responsible for building core back-end functionalities and RESTful APIs with Java and Spring Boot, contributing directly to the project's development lifecycle.

short_description: A command-line interpreter (shell) built in C.
long_description: A C-based implementation of a Linux shell (command-line interpreter). This project demonstrates low-level system programming and process management, including parsing user input, handling built-in commands, and executing external system commands.

short_description: My first portfolio project from the Udacity Nanodegree.
long_description: A professional portfolio website built as part of the Udacity Nanodegree. It specializes in building full-stack applications using React.js and Java (Spring Boot), and showcases my passion for building intelligent and efficient solutions.
